description: The `ballerinax/sap.s4hana.api_outbound_delivery_srv_0002` package offers APIs for seamless integration with the [Outbound Delivery API v1.0.0](https://api.sap.com/api/API_OUTBOUND_DELIVERY_SRV_0002/overview). This service enables you to create, read, update and delete outbound deliveries.
